item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Global equities are more attractive after the recent rout removed market froth and as investors focus on robust corporate earnings, according to Citigroup Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 中国主权基金加大 ETF 购买以提振股市
item.description: 彭博社的分析显示，中国的主权财富基金在第一季度可能购买了至少 430 亿美元的在岸交易所交易基金，从而揭示了国家为阻止市场下滑而采取的救市措施的程度。【原文：China’s sovereign wealth fund likely bought at least $43 billion of onshore exchange-traded funds in the first quarter, Bloomberg’s analysis shows, shedding light on the extent of state rescue to stem a market tailspin.】

item.title: 押注旧经济股票使欧洲基金超越同侪
item.description: 有时，股市中不那么耀眼的部分也能帮助基金跑赢大市。【原文：Sometimes it’s the less glamorous parts of the stock market that can help a fund outperform.】

item.title: 德国服务业蓬勃发展，私营部门恢复增长
item.description: 德国私营部门活动 10 个月来首次出现增长，这进一步表明复苏正在欧洲最大的经济体中慢慢扎根。【原文：German private-sector activity grew for the first time in 10 months, adding to signs that a recovery is slowly taking root in Europe’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 意大利烘焙商 Lavazza 收购自动售货机制造商 IVS
item.description: 咖啡烘焙商 Luigi Lavazza SpA 同意收购自动售货机制造商 IVS 集团，此前该公司与其大股东一起向意大利公司发出了现金收购要约，这使得 IVS 的股价在米兰开盘时一路飙升。【原文：Coffee roaster Luigi Lavazza SpA agreed to buy vending machine maker IVS Group after launching a cash offer for the Italian company along with its majority shareholder, sending IVS shares soaring at the opening in Milan.】

item.title: 瑞士称已冻结 142 亿美元俄罗斯资产
item.description: 瑞士冻结了在该国持有的 130 亿瑞士法郎（142 亿美元）的俄罗斯资产，其中包括俄罗斯中央银行超过 70 亿瑞士法郎的储备和资产。【原文：Switzerland has blocked 13 billion francs ($14.2 billion) in Russian assets held in the country, including more than 7 billion francs in reserves and assets of Russia’s central bank.】

item.title: 瑞典 Alecta 公司在经历了一年的动荡后取得了积极的回报
item.description: 瑞典养老基金 Alecta 在宣布利基银行和房地产亏损 30 多亿美元一年后，取得了稳健的投资回报。【原文：A year after announcing more than $3 billion in losses on niche banks and real estate, Swedish pension fund Alecta delivered solid returns on its investments.】

item.title: 中国钢铁出口激增加剧全球贸易紧张局势
item.description: 自 2010 年代中期全球钢材供应过剩以来，中国掀起了最大的钢材出口浪潮，随着钢材进入更广泛的目的地，全球贸易紧张局势愈演愈烈。【原文：China’s biggest wave of steel exports since a global glut in the mid-2010s is inflaming trade tensions across the world as the metal reaches a wider range of destinations.】

item.title: Taylor Wimpey 预计英国房屋销售下滑将持续至第一季度
item.description: Taylor Wimpey Plc 未能将较低的抵押贷款利率转化为较高的房屋销售水平，并维持其对 2024 年交易量减少的预测。【原文：Taylor Wimpey Plc is failing to see lower mortgage rates translate into higher levels of home sales and is maintaining its forecast for fewer deals in 2024.】

item.title: 英国将全年金边债券销售计划上调幅度超出预期
item.description: 英国政府提高了本财年计划出售的债券额度，增幅超过分析师预期，使其成为有史以来第二大金边债券计划。【原文：The UK government raised the amount of bonds it plans to sell this fiscal year by more than analysts expected, adding to what was already the second-largest gilt package on record.】

item.title: 茱比特报告客户流出 16 亿英镑，但资产增加
item.description: 2024 年第一季度，朱庇特基金管理公司（Jupiter Fund Management Plc）的客户从其基金中净撤资 16 亿英镑（约合 20 亿美元），该资产管理公司仍在努力应对多年来的资金外流问题。【原文：Clients at Jupiter Fund Management Plc yanked a net £1.6 billion ($2 billion) from its funds in the first quarter of 2024 as the asset manager continues to grapple with years of outflows.】

item.title: 英美资源集团在复苏缓慢之际削减钻石产量目标
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）下调了今年的钻石生产目标，因为该行业在经历了灾难性的2023年之后，仍在为过多的库存而苦苦挣扎。【原文：Anglo American Plc has cut its diamond production target for the year as the industry continues to struggle with too much inventory after a disastrous 2023.】

item.title: 速报采购经理人指数显示印度经济活动继续扩张
item.description: 据汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项即时调查显示，在服务业和制造业的强劲推动下，印度 4 月份的经济活动继续扩张。【原文：India’s economic activity continued to expand in April, driven by strength in both the services and manufacturing sectors, according to a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc.】

item.title: 阿布扎比自 2021 年以来首次重返欧洲债券市场
item.description: 阿布扎比自 2021 年以来首次出售欧元债券。【原文：Abu Dhabi is selling its first eurobonds since 2021.】

item.description: 据一个商业团体称，由于政策的不可预测性，美国公司对在中国投资持谨慎态度，因为中国政府正努力吸引外国资金以促进经济发展。【原文：US companies are wary about investing in China because of policy unpredictability, according to a business group, as Beijing struggles to attract foreign funds to boost its economy.】

item.title: 中国投资者推动港股交易份额创新高
item.description: 4 月份，中国内地投资者在港股总成交额中所占的比例上升至创纪录的日均水平，最新出台的加强港股地位的措施可能会促进他们的购买。【原文：Chinese mainland investors increased their portion of total turnover of Hong Kong stocks to a record daily average in April, with the latest measures to bolster the city’s position potentially boosting their purchases.】

item.title: 日元下跌后，上田再次承诺在价格允许的情况下提高利率
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）重申，如果基本通胀率升至2%的目标，日本央行将上调基准利率，他的讲话似乎经过精心调整，以避免在日元对美元汇率创下34年新低后进一步加剧日元疲软。【原文：Governor Kazuo Ueda reiterated the Bank of Japan’s intention to raise its benchmark interest rate if underlying inflation rises toward its 2% target, in remarks that appeared carefully tuned to avoid fueling further yen weakness after the currency hit a fresh 34-year low versus the dollar.】

item.title: 中国财政部响应习近平呼吁在中国人民银行进行债券交易
item.description: 中国财政部表示支持允许央行交易政府债券，重申了习近平主席的一句话，这句话点燃了市场对货币策略改变的猜测。【原文：China’s Ministry of Finance said it supports allowing the central bank to trade government bonds, reaffirming a sentence from President Xi Jinping that ignited market speculation about a change of monetary strategy.】

item.title: 黄金 (XAUUSD) 在创下近两年来最大单日跌幅后再度下跌
item.description: 中东地缘政治风险的减弱抑制了避险需求，投资者也在关注美联储不会很快降息的信号，黄金在创下近两年来最大盘中跌幅后再次下跌。【原文：Gold fell again after its biggest intraday loss in almost two years, with subsiding geopolitical risks in the Middle East crimping haven demand and investors monitoring signals the Federal Reserve won’t soon cut rates.】

item.title: First Sentier 因收费过低关闭 90 亿美元基金并裁员
item.description: 澳大利亚基金管理公司 First Sentier Investors 周二宣布，计划关闭四只基金，总金额达 140 亿澳元（约合 90 亿美元），以退出低利润业务线。【原文：Australian fund manager First Sentier Investors plans to close four funds totaling A$14 billion ($9 billion) in a retreat from low-margin business lines, it announced Tuesday.】

item.title: 随着产量的增加，北极星公司的黄金销售量也随之增加
item.description: 由于贵金属价格接近历史最高水平，澳大利亚矿商北极星资源有限公司（Northern Star Resources Ltd.）预计本季度黄金销售量将 "大幅增加"，原因是包括超级矿坑（Super Pit）在内的卡尔古利（Kalgoorlie）矿场产量增加、品位提高。【原文：Australian miner Northern Star Resources Ltd. expects to “significantly increase” gold sales this quarter on higher production and better grades from its Kalgoorlie operations, including the Super Pit, as prices for the precious metal trade near record levels.】
